oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Andrews family photograph, undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kirkpatrick, B.S.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of a cousin of the Andrews family and one other woman. The photograph is attached to a small envelope addressed to Mr. Garnett Andrews, in Rossville Ga., from B. S. Kirkpatric in Lynchburg, Va. The handwritten note on the reverse side of the image reads "If you ever wonder what your cousins look like, look at the taller one who is proving to the world that she has four perfectly good fingers and a thumb."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Southern States -- Social life and customs
Andrews family
